titleStmt.title: An answer to Francis Bugg's presumptuous impeachment, pretended on behalf of the Commons of England, against the Quakers yearly-meeting.
titleStmt.author: Vaughton, John, 1644-1712.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by T. Sowle ...,

notesStmt.note: Signed on p. 8 by John Vaughton, Samuel Watson, John Field, Thomas Lower, William Bingley.
Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
